BC.name: Barnard Castle Emergency Services
BC.Ownership: County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service
BC.Additionalinformation: Barnard Castle Emergency Services is a shared facility that houses the fire station, ambulance station, police station, and mountain rescue station for the Barnard Castle area. The fire station operates on a Retained Duty System (RDS) basis, meaning that firefighters are on call and respond to emergencies as needed. The facility is owned by the County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service and is freehold. It serves as a response station for the local community, providing essential emergency services to the area.

BA.name: Bishop Auckland Community Fire Station
BA.Ownership: County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service
BA.Additionalinformation: Bishop Auckland Community Fire Station is a shared facility that houses the fire station for the Bishop Auckland area. The fire station operates on both a Retained Duty System (RDS) and Wholetime (WT) basis, meaning that firefighters are on call and respond to emergencies as needed, while also having a dedicated team of firefighters who are stationed at the facility. The station is owned by the County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service and is leasehold. It serves as a response station for the local community, providing essential emergency services to the area.

HQ.name: Service Headquarters
HQ.Additionalinformation: The Service Headquarters is the central administrative and operational hub for the County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service. It houses the main offices, control room, and other essential facilities for the management and coordination of fire and rescue services across the region. The headquarters is owned by the County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service and is leasehold. It serves as the command center for emergency response operations, ensuring effective communication and coordination during incidents.

TR.name: Training Centre
TR.address: Bowburn Industrial Estate South, Bowburn, Co Durham
TR.Ownership: County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service
TR.Additionalinformation: The Training Centre is a dedicated facility for the training and development of firefighters and other emergency personnel within the County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service. It provides a range of training programs and exercises to ensure that staff are equipped with the necessary skills and knowledge to effectively respond to emergencies. The training center is owned by the County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service and is freehold. It serves as a vital resource for the ongoing professional development of fire service personnel.

TS.name: Technical Services
TS.address: Bowburn Industrial Estate South, Bowburn, Co Durham
TS.Ownership: County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service
TS.Additionalinformation: The Technical Services facility is a dedicated site for the maintenance, repair, and servicing of fire service equipment and vehicles within the County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service. It ensures that all equipment is in optimal condition and ready for use during emergencies. The facility is owned by the County Durham and Darlington Fire and Rescue Service and is freehold. It plays a crucial role in supporting the operational readiness of the fire service by providing essential technical support.
